review_blob: First sniffing this beer you will smell the wonderful hops that IPA drinkers can appreciate. The taste of this beer is delicious hops. Not overpowering hops but just pure deliciousness.

At first sip I was hit with a sledgehammer of hops. Not that Im not used to hops but I was expecting a porter with a hoppy aftertaste. After a few sips I began tasting the fullness of the porter and it turned into a full hopped up porter like I expected.
